subject: Welcome to NOGIC JQS Portal
title: Individual Welcome Message
body:
Dear {{first_name}} {{last_name}},


Welcome to the NOGIC JQS (Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry Content Joint Qualification System) Portal 
On successful login to your portal account, you MUST update your profile information. This would ensure that your exact profile details are available at NCDMB (Nigerian Content Development & Monitoring Board) for full evaluation and proper consideration.
The following steps enumerate how you can easily do this:
Step 1: Log in using your username (email) and portal password.
Step 2: Upon Successful Login, Update your bio-data, Educational Qualification,Industry Certification,Job Experience,Skill, Training.
Step 3: Upload copies of all claimed certificates.
Thank You.
